text_sections.section_2: To improve the website, the and set and . In doing so, the DAAD and third parties transfer usage data to is no level of data protection comparable to that under EU law. By clicking the "Accept all" button, you consent to this processing. You can also find selection options and explanations of these cookies and processing at the end of this page under "Cookies". There you can consent at any time with effect for the future.
text_sections.section_12: The German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) has numerous Regional Offices, Information Centres and Information Points around the world
text_sections.section_19: The Study in Germany campaign is implemented by the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD). The DAAD network, in turn, consists of Regional Offices, Information Centres and Information Points through which DAAD staff worldwide share their expertise and help to ensure that international experience from different perspectives flows into DAAD projects. This means that the DAAD is represented in more than 60 countries in a wide variety of ways. Addresses and telephone numbers for contacts in your area as well as the addresses of local DAAD offices can be found directly on  (https://www.daad.de/en/the-daad/map/daad-network/)
text_sections.section_20: You can also find the contact details of the DAAD headquarters on  (https://www.daad.de/en/the-daad/contact/addresses-telephone-numbers/)

meta_tags.description: Are you interested in the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD)? Learn more about Regional Offices, Information Centres and Information Points around the world.
